name: FORAHealthView
0:
”Alexa, open Health View”
”Alexa, ask health view what my blood pressure has been this week”
”Alexa, ask health view How is my health condition”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: health view
Developer Terms of Use
des:
FORA HealthView keeps you informed about your health conditions based on the uploaded records. Through voice interactions, you can easily retrieve your latest records, ask for your average results of the week or of the month, or remind yourself of your target range.
You must have a FORA 24/7 HealthView account and a valid password to initiate this skill. 
If you’re willing to share your information with family not living in the same household, you can authorize them to review your health conditions through this HealthView skill on their Alexa speakers as well.
Additionally, if you adopt the iFORA IntelliSpeaker, which is also an Alexa-enabled smart speaker, you will be able to upload measurement data automatically without requiring the use of your mobile phone or Gateway.

FORA HealthView provides the information only from the true measurement results. We do not provide medical diagnosis nor treatment. Please always consult your physician if you would have any questions or medical conditions.
